original_text: Then the eleven disciples went to Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus had told them to go.
korean_text: 열한 제자가 갈릴리에 가서 예수께서 지시하신 산에 이르러

sentences.original_text: Then the eleven disciples went to Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 열한 명의 제자가 갈릴리로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to the mountain where Jesus had told them to go
